description: Add Win Probability Chart and Live Plays Feed components to the existing game detail page, integrating data from the new win_probability and live_plays tables created by the live-scraper-v2 backend
goal: Display all 100+ live game data points captured by the v2 scraper in the existing Next.js game detail page UI, maintaining consistent styling with existing components
requirements: Add WinProbabilityChart component - interactive line chart showing 180+ WP data points per game
Add LivePlaysCard component - scrollable play-by-play feed from live_plays table
Update game-queries.ts to fetch win_probability and live_plays data
Add TypeScript interfaces for WinProbability and LivePlay types
Update GameHeader to show live game state (clock, possession, down/distance) when status=in_progress
Stick to existing component styles using shadcn/ui Card, Badge, etc
Mobile responsive design matching existing components
out_of_scope: Creating new design system or themes
constraints: Must use existing shadcn/ui components (Card, Badge, Tabs, etc)
Must follow existing code patterns in src/components/game/
Must use Supabase server-side queries like existing components
Win probability chart should use Canvas or SVG (no heavy chart libraries)
